title: 009 - The Canadian Diplomat
description: On today's show, the guys welcome back our Canadian pal, Gump. The boys fire several questions at Gump about the differences between Canada and the United States and are surprised by several of his answers. The guys also discuss how the wave is dead and Foxy defends doing it at sporting events, they answer questions from The People of The Pod, react to some videos that made headlines this weekend, Pat recounts a recent run-in with what he thought was a home intruder, and the members of The Pub recount a very creepy experience when they recently went looking for a new house. Today is a fun one. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
